article:
When the Americans were getting ready to send their first man to the moon, an old Irishman   was watching them on the television in the bar of a hotel. There was an Englishman in the bar, too, and he  said to  the Irishman, "The  _  are very clever, aren't they? They are going  to send  some men to the moon. It is a long  _  from the world."
"Oh, that's  _ ," the Irishman answered quickly. "The Irish are going to send some men to the sun in a few months. That's  far  away from the moon, you know."
"Yes, it is." The English man said, " _  it is too  _  for the people to go to."
The Irishman laughed and said, "Well, the Irish aren't stupid, you know, we  _  go to the sun during the day, of course, we will go there  during the night ."
